prompts.flatlay:
E-commerce flat lay photograph. COPY the EXACT composition from the LAST reference image.

IMAGE ORDER:
- Images 1-2: Product photos of {{productColor}} {{shortProductName}} - use for color and details
- LAST image: Composition reference - COPY THIS EXACTLY

COMPOSITION - COPY FROM REFERENCE:
- Match EXACT garment position from reference
- T-shirt laid flat, sleeves spread
- Match overall framing and crop

PRODUCT - MUST MATCH INPUT IMAGES:
- {{productColor}} crew neck t-shirt
- Solid orange ombre gradient color
- Ron Dorff label at neckline
- Two BLACK metal RON DORFF eyelets at hem - MUST be visible
- Short sleeves

CRITICAL REQUIREMENTS:
- Garment PRESSED and CRISP - graphical catalog quality
- ZERO wrinkles, ZERO creases
- Neckline clean and properly shaped
- Sleeves laid flat and symmetrical

LIGHTING & BACKGROUND:
Light gray studio backdrop. Bright, even e-commerce lighting.
prompts.eyelet:
E-commerce detail photograph. COPY the EXACT composition from the LAST reference image.

IMAGE ORDER:
- Images 1-2: Product photos - use for exact color
- LAST image: Composition reference - COPY THIS EXACTLY

COMPOSITION - COPY FROM REFERENCE:
- Fabric runs DIAGONALLY
- Hem edge visible at bottom of frame
- Tight macro crop

PRODUCT DETAILS - MUST INCLUDE:
- Two BLACK metal RON DORFF eyelets
- Eyelets have white text engraved around rim
- {{productColor}} smooth cotton fabric

CRITICAL: Fabric FLAT. Eyelets sharp and legible.

LIGHTING & BACKGROUND:
Light gray background at edges. Bright macro lighting.
prompts.collar:
E-commerce collar detail photograph. COPY the EXACT composition from the LAST reference image.

IMAGE ORDER:
- Images 1-2: Product photos - use for color and details
- LAST image: Composition reference - COPY THIS EXACTLY

COMPOSITION - COPY FROM REFERENCE:
- Neckline fills frame
- Show collar construction
- Ron Dorff label visible at back neck

PRODUCT DETAILS:

- Ribbed collar band
- Ron Dorff label at neckline

CRITICAL: Collar clean and crisp. Fabric flat.

LIGHTING & BACKGROUND:
Light gray backdrop. Bright, even studio lighting.
